title: Today’s best deals: Samsung portable and internal SSDs, storage, and wearables
description: A handful of Samsung devices are on sale for record lows.

title: Health info for 1 million patients stolen using critical GoAnywhere vulnerability
description: With exploit code in the wild and devastating results, organizations should patch pronto.

title: Tesla finally agrees to open its charging network to all EVs in US
description: Biden announced new rules today to standardize America's EV-charging experience.

title: Google Fiber comes back to life with 5 gigabit service, plans for 8Gbps soon
description: The once-dormant service is rolling out 5Gbps service to a small group of cities.

title: Outbreak of Marburg, Ebola’s similarly deadly relative, spurs response race
description: Nine people have already died, making it the deadliest outbreak in over a decade.

title: Western Digital starts selling 44TB of external HDD storage for $1,100
description: The 44TB offerings ship in RAID 0, but you can opt for a RAID 1 configuration.

title: Report: Musk had Twitter engineers boost his tweets after Biden got more views
description: Musk reportedly gets "power user multiplier" to rank his tweets above others.

title: Hyundai, Kia pushing updates so you can’t just steal their cars with USB cables
description: The updates, rolling out for more than 8 million cars, also come with stickers.

title: After a decade in development, Japan’s H3 rocket is ready for its debut
description: "If we cannot attain that, our development program is completely stopped."

title: Earthquake in Turkey exposes gap between seismic knowledge and action
description: Turkey's National Disaster Management Plan was never implemented.
